A trilha sonora te levarÃƒÂ¡ diretamente aos anos 80, com algumas das principais bandas de rock do perÃƒÂ­odo, tais como Stone Roses, The Cure, REM, Japan, Jesus and Mary Chain e Joy Division. Recomendado aos livres de espÃƒÂ­rito.

A teenage boy loses his footing when he finds himself drawn to the new boy in class. It's November 1989, and the Berlin Wall is falling. In Stavanger, Norway, teenage boy Jarle has a great new girlfriend and is starting a rock band with his buddies. But when a new boy, the synth pop-listening Yngve, joins his class, Jarle is more fascinated than he wants to be, and the world as he knows it starts to crumble.
